testcase.classname: Use the website to find restaurants
testcase.name: Search for restaurants in an area
testcase.system-out: Given I want food in AR51 1AA...............................................passed When I search for restaurant................................................passed Then I should see some restaurants in AR51 1AA..............................passed

testcase.classname: Use the website to find restaurants
testcase.name: Sort the list of restaurants by distance in an area
testcase.system-out: Given User is on restaurant list page of area AR51 1AA......................passed When User mouse over on Sorted By Best Match................................passed Then User should see the list and select Distance option....................passed Then User can see sort listed restaurants by distance.......................passed

testcase.classname: Use the website to find restaurants
testcase.name: Search for location with invalid postcode
testcase.system-out: Given User is on restaurant list page.......................................passed When User navigate to Home Page by clicking Change location link............passed Then User search for invalid area "45AR 1AA"................................passed And User should see warning to enter valid postcode.........................passed Then User close the browser.................................................passed
